You plan to visit 4 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 7 days in Nice. You are going to attend a wedding in Nice between day 5 and day 11. You want to spend 5 days in Mykonos. You plan to stay in Vilnius for 4 days. During day 14 and day 17, you have to attend a conference in Vilnius. You would like to visit Warsaw for 4 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Warsaw and Vilnius, Mykonos and Nice, Nice and Warsaw.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
